<title level="1" right="Rules">[Shield Statistics](/Rules.aspx?ID=2181)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 274 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Shields have statistics that follow the same rules as armor: Price, Speed Penalty, and Bulk. See [armor](/Rules.aspx?ID=2166) for the rules for those statistics. Their other statistics are described here.
</column>
